statements: UPDATE SocialMediaEngagementMetrics SET likes = 50, comments = 20 WHERE post_id = 100
UPDATE SocialMediaEngagementMetrics SET shares = 10, engagement_level = 3 WHERE id = 5
UPDATE SocialMediaEngagementMetrics SET likes = 100, comments = 50 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE SocialMediaEngagementMetrics SET engagement_level = 2, likes = 75, shares = 20 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET likes = 100 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_strategies SET success_metric = 'ROI' WHERE strategy_id = 5;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET likes = 500, comments = 100 WHERE post_id = 123
UPDATE marketing_strategies SET success_metric = 'ROI', audience_segment = 'Gen Z' WHERE strategy_id = 456
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET likes = 100, comments = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_strategies SET engagement_goal = 500, target_audience = 'Young Adults' WHERE platform = 'Instagram';
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET likes = 100, comments = 50 WHERE platform = 'Twitter' AND post_id = 12345;
UPDATE marketing_strategies SET engagement_goal = 1000, target_audience = 'Young Adults' WHERE platform = 'Instagram';
UPDATE engagements SET likes = 50, shares = 20 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE posts SET content = 'Updated content', post_date = '2023-09-20 10:30:00' WHERE post_id = 456;
UPDATE engagements SET likes = likes + 1, comments = comments + 2 WHERE user_id = 123 AND post_id = 456;
UPDATE users SET followers = followers - 100, following = following + 50 WHERE user_id = 789;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers_count = 1000 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET post_content = 'New post content' WHERE post_id = 5;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers_count = followers_count + 1000, engagement_rate = 0.05 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET post_content = 'Updated post content!', post_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE post_id = 5;
